entry.title: DuroStar DS13000DX 13,000W/10,500W 500cc Electric Start Dual Fuel Portable Generator w/ CO Alert
entry.summary:
Vendor: DuroStar
Type: Generators
Price: 1699.00

The DS13000DX is the largest and most powerful Dual Fuel generator in the DX Series, with 13,000 peak watts and 10,500 running watts. Powered by our DuroStar 500cc OHV engine, this generator is the PERFECT HOME POWER BACKUP solution and will run your household essentials such as lights, appliances, and central AC system with EASE during a blackout, storm, or emergency event.

Key Features

  • RUNS ON GAS OR PROPANE

    Runs on gasoline or liquid propane, offering the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice.

  • EQUIPPED WITH CO ALERT

    An advanced technology to keep your family safe and sound from harmful engine fumes.

  • DIGITAL COMMAND CENTER

    Track voltage output, operating frequency, and maintenance hours.

  • PUSH BUTTON START

    With Push Button Start, starting your generator is as easy as starting your car.

Features
  • Dual fuel engine for flexibility
  • Electric start feature for easy startups
  • EZ start recoil backup feature
  • 100% copper windings for longevity
  • Carbon monoxide sensor for safety
  • Convenient front facing propane inlet
  • EPA and CARB approved
  • 5-year warranty

Only as Strong as Its Core.
The DuroStar DS13000DX is the first unit to feature an OHV Air Cooled Engine. Look around and you will not find another unit with this large of an engine. This powerplant produces the 13,000 watts of peak power that feeds the fully functional power panel. A newly added feature is the Idle Control (referred to as Auto Throttle) which enable the motor to maintain RPM's under varying loads. This help maximizes fuel efficiency while minimizing the noise output. By utilizing an engine, the DS13000DX can handle heavy electrical loads as well as easily power multiple small load appliances simultaneously.

Easy Out of Box Operation & Peace of Mind.
All DuroStar Generators all carry a 1 Year Factory Warranty so if for any reason your generator gives you problems simply let us know and we will do our best to make it right. As always DuroStar offers its 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee standard on every item we sell. All DuroStar Generators are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

entry.title: DuroMax XP13000DX 13,000 Watt Dual Fuel Gas Propane Portable Generator w/ CO Alert
entry.summary:
Vendor: DuroMax
Type: Generators
Price: 1699.00

The XP13000DX is the largest and most powerful Dual Fuel generator in the DX Series, with 13,000 peak watts and 10,500 running watts. Powered by our DuroMax 500cc OHV engine, this generator is the PERFECT HOME POWER BACKUP solution and will run your household essentials such as lights, appliances, and central AC system with EASE during a blackout, storm, or emergency event.

Key Features

  • RUNS ON GAS OR PROPANE

    Runs on gasoline or liquid propane, offering the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice.

  • EQUIPPED WITH CO ALERT

    An advanced technology to keep your family safe and sound from harmful engine fumes.

  • DIGITAL COMMAND CENTER

    Track voltage output, operating frequency, and maintenance hours.

  • PUSH BUTTON START

    With Push Button Start, starting your generator is as easy as starting your car.

Features
  • DUAL FUEL TECHNOLOGY: Runs on gasoline or propane, offering the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice.
  • EQUIPPED WITH CO ALERT: Protects you from harmful engine fumes by automatically shutting down the generator when an unsafe level of carbon monoxide is detected.
  • FULLY LOADED POWER PANEL: This generator comes equipped with four 120V 20AMP GFCI outlets, one 120V 30AMP twist lock, one 120 / 240V 30AMP twist lock, and one 120 / 240V 50AMP heavy-duty transfer switch-ready outlet. Includes individual circuit breakers, idle control, and a low oil sensor.
  • 100% COPPER WINDINGS & ALL-METAL CONSTRUCTION: Designed with high quality and durability in mind. Unlike aluminum windings, premium copper windings double the life of your generator, ensuring it lasts you for years.
  • EASY PUSH BUTTON START: Start your generator quickly and effortlessly.
  • DIGITAL CONTROL CENTER: Allows you to track voltage output, operating frequency, and maintenance hours at a glance.
  • WHEEL AND HANDLE KIT: This portable generator is easily transported over any terrain, providing power whenever and wherever you need it.
  • EPA AND CARB CERTIFIED: Approved for use in all 50 states.
  • 5 YEAR WARRANTY: DuroMax DX and X Series generators come with an industry-leading 5 Year Residential Warranty and lifetime customer support.
  • INCLUDED IN THE BOX: Oil funnel, plug wrench, tool set, propane regulator, wheel kit, user manual.
 

Only as Strong as Its Core.
The DuroMax XP13000DX Generator has a Cast-Ironed Sleeved, 500cc Engine delivering a peak of 13000 surge watts / 10500 Constant. This is a sufficient amount of power that can handle high requirement loads as well as multiple small load appliances simultaneously. Designed for Safe and Easy Operation, the XP13000DX features a user-friendly, Electric Start, that's as simple as starting your car. It is also equipped with a recoil start in case of the battery being drained. Solid-Fill tires are also standard, they will never run flat, and high leverage handles that make it easy to transport over every terrain. (except water - we are working on skus). The attached oversized noise reducing Muffler has a built-in Spark Arrestor for safe use in mandated camping areas and jobsites. All DuroMax Generators are user-friendly and are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, assemble the wheels and handles, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

Safe & Reliable Operation for Any User.
Designed for Safe and Easy Operation, the XP13000DX features a user-friendly, Electric Start, that's as simple as starting your car. It is also equipped with a recoil start in case of the battery being drained. Solid-Fill tires are also standard, they will never run flat, and high leverage handles that make it easy to transport over every terrain. The attached oversized noise reducing Muffler has a built-in Spark Arrestor for safe use in mandated camping areas and jobsites.

Easy Out of Box Operation & Peace of Mind.

All DuroMax Generators carry a 1 Year Factory Warranty so if for any reason your generator gives you problems simply let us know and we will do our best to make it right. As always DuroMax offers its 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee standard on every item we sell. All DuroMax Generators are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

entry.title: Generac 7228 18KW Guardian Home Backup Generator w/WiFi and Home Transfer Switch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Generac
Type: Generators
Price: 5647.00

Product Downloads

Brochure

Specifications

Owner's Manual

Wi-Fi Manual

Warranty

Features
  • Air-cooled home backup generator that runs on a Generac 816cc G-Force twin-cylinder engine with a 3600 RPM max. The aluminum cylinder block and sturdy casing make it very durable
  • The model features a dual-fuel carburetion system that runs on liquid propane or natural gas. It produces 18,000 watts on LP and 17,000 on natural gas. Changing from LP to natural gas is easy
  • The oil tank stores up to 2.2 quarts / 2.1 liters of oil. The full pressure oil lubrication system allows the engine to run efficiently for long hours. It will also extend the maintenance intervals
  • The automatic transfer switch has a NEMA/UL 3R aluminum enclosure and can be installed both indoors and outdoors
  • Choose from 100amp 16-circuit switch or a 200amp service rated smart switch
  • The ATS features smart management modules to manage power for air-conditioners and similar heavy loads
  • Smart Management Module manages up to 4 air conditioners efficiently. The load management system protects the engine from overload so the generator never shuts down when you need it the most.
  • G-Flex variable speed technology allows the air-cooled gas engine to operate at various speeds to adjust to the changing load conditions
  • This all-new Guardian 7226 generator can power up air conditioners, refrigerators, furnaces, sump pumps, microwaves, computers, monitors, TV, lights, and more
  • TRUE POWER TECHNOLOGY makes it perfect for use with modern electronics and appliances with micro-circuitry such as HVACs, refrigerators, laptops, cell phones, and tablets
  • The model is cETL/ETL, cUL2200/UL2200 certified

GENERAC GUARDIAN SERIES 18KW GENERATOR FEATURES AND BENEFITS
This generator provides essential circuit power protection for your home during a power outage, ensuring that essential appliances maintain power. This standby generator is automatic and offers protection year-round, for less than the cost of central air conditioning.
Every Guardian Series home standby generator comes with Mobile Link™ Remote Monitoring. Remote Monitoring is FREE, and allows you to monitor the status of your generator from anywhere in the world. Use a smartphone, PC, or tablet to access generator information, such as the current operating status and maintenance alerts. By connecting your account you have access to authorized service dealers for fast, friendly, and proactive service.
Generac generators are ideal for weathering storms and power outages. Their automatic backup power gives you piece of mind that your home and appliances are protected.
Generac generators and engines are designed, engineered and assembled in the USA using domestic and foreign parts.
The Generac G-Force Engine is built to handle the stressors of generator use. This results in power that’s more reliable and requires less routine maintenance than competitor engines. Generac’s new G-Force engine is purpose built and pressure-lubricated. It features hydraulic lifters, which improve engine performance and extending the life of the product. (Hydraulic lifters only available on the 13 & 16 kW.)

  • Powerful Engine the DuroStar 500cc OHV engine is a workhorse that provides plenty of power to handle multiple jobs from powering high voltage appliances to heavy duty power tools.
  • Front Fuel Switch control the fuel input on the front of the generator. Set the fuel to gasoline, propane, or use it to run the fuel out of the carburetor for storage.
  • Idle Control lowers the RPMs of the generator when not in use saving fuel and reducing noise. Ideal in situations like on job sites where power is used intermittently.
  • Low Oil Shutoff protects your investment by automatically shutting the generator off when it senses that the oil is low.
  • Fully Featured Power Panel the power panel includes a wide selection of outlets for maximum compatibility in your applications including: 2 120V household GFCI outlets, 1 120V 30A twist lock outlet, 1 240V 30A outlet, and 1 240V 50A outlet, and a 12V automotive outlet. The panel also includes a digital voltmeter.
  • Complies with Emissions Standards all DuroStar generators are both approved by the EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) and CARB (California Air Resources Board) and follow strict guidelines to ensure our generators are as environmentally friendly as possible.

Easy Out of Box Operation & Peace of Mind.
All DuroStar Generators all carry a 3 Year Factory Warranty and 1 Year Commercial Factory Warranty so if for any reason your generator gives you problems simply let us know and we will do our best to make it right. As always DuroStar offers its 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee standard on every item we sell. All DuroStar Generators are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

Only as Strong as Its Core.
The DS13000EH features a heavy-duty steel frame roll cage with fully isolated for smooth and easy operation. The generator also has 2 large, easy to grip stow-away handles to make moving this unit around easy in addition to its rugged, heavy duty wheels. Also, an added feature is the removable lifting brace that makes raising this unit off the ground easy with jobsite equipment.

Safe & Reliable Operation for Any User.
Designed for Safe and Easy Operation, the DS13000EH features a user-friendly, Electric Start, that's as simple as starting your car. It is also equipped with a recoil start in case of the battery being drained. Solid-Fill tires are also standard, they will never run flat, and high leverage handles that make it easy to transport over every terrain. The attached oversized noise reducing Muffler has a built-in Spark Arrestor for safe use in mandated camping areas and jobsites.

entry.title: DuroMax XP11500EH 11,500 Watt Portable Dual Fuel Gas Propane Generator
entry.summary:
Vendor: DuroMax
Type: Generators
Price: 1299.00

Be ready for anything with the DuroMax XP11500EH generator. Equipped to run on either gasoline or liquid propane, this dual fuel unit can perform anywhere that portable power is needed. Easy to transport over any terrain, from the neck of the woods to the downtown jobsite, the XP11500EH generator will keep you going.

Key Features

  • POWERFUL 457cc ENGINE
    Plenty of power for your most demanding needs.

  • SURGE-ARREST
    Protects your generator from power surges.

  • ALL METAL CONSTRUCTION
    Built tough to last even on the roughest job sites.

  • EXTENDED RUNTIME
    Up to 8 hours on a full tank of gasoline.

Features
  • Plenty of Power – With 11,500 starting watts and 9,000 running watts, this unit can handle heavy loads, from lights and a refrigerator to a home air conditioner and high amperage power tools.
  • Dual Fuel Technology – This generator runs on gasoline or propane, giving you the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice.
  • Powerful Engine – The DuroMax 457cc OHV engine is a workhorse that provides plenty of power to handle multiple jobs, from powering high voltage appliances to heavy duty power tools.
  • Low Oil Shutoff – Protects your investment by automatically shutting the generator off when it senses that the oil is low.
  • Fully Featured Power Panel – The power panel includes a wide selection of outlets for maximum compatibility in your applications including: 2 120V household GFCI outlets, 1 120V 30A twist lock outlet, 1 240V 30A outlet, and one 240V 50A outlet. The panel also includes a digital voltmeter.
  • Complies with Emissions Standards – All DuroMax generators are both approved by the EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) and CARB (California Air Resources Board) and follow strict guidelines to ensure our generators are as environmentally friendly as possible.

Easy Out of Box Operation & Peace of Mind.
All DuroMax Generators carry a 3 Year Factory Warranty and 1 Year Commercial Factory Warranty so if for any reason your generator gives you problems simply let us know and we will do our best to make it right. As always DuroMax offers its 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee standard on every item we sell. All DuroMax Generators are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

Safe & Reliable Operation for Any User.
Designed for Safe and Easy Operation, the XP11500EH features a user-friendly, Electric Start, that's as simple as starting your car. It is also equipped with a recoil start in case of the battery being drained. Solid-Fill tires are also standard, they will never run flat, and high leverage handles that make it easy to transport over every terrain. The attached oversized noise reducing Muffler has a built-in Spark Arrestor for safe use in mandated camping areas and jobsites.

Only as Strong as Its Core.
The DuroMax XP11500EH is the first unit to feature an OHV Air Cooled Engine. Look around and you will not find another unit with this large of an engine. This powerplant produces the 11,500 watts of peak power that feeds the fully functional power panel. By utilizing an engine, the XP11500EH can handle heavy electrical loads as well as easily power multiple small load appliances simultaneously. All DuroMax Generators are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, assemble the wheels and handles, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

entry.title: DuroMax XP4850HX 4,850 Watt Portable Dual Fuel Gas Propane CO Alert Generator
entry.summary:
Vendor: DuroMax
Type: Generators
Price: 499.00

The XP4850HX packs a punch with 4,850 watts of power you can take anywhere! With a 210cc OHV DuroMax Engine, this workhorse is PERFECT for camping, RVs, tailgating, and can power lights and household appliances such as refrigerators, freezers, and fans during any power outage or emergency event.

Key Features

  • RUNS ON GAS OR PROPANE

    Runs on gasoline or liquid propane, offering the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice

  • EQUIPPED WITH CO ALERT

    An advanced technology to keep your family safe and sound from harmful engine fumes.

  • DIGITAL COMMAND CENTER

    Track voltage output, operating frequency, and maintenance hours.

  • MX2 TECHNOLOGY

    Double the 120v power for appliances and RV's

Features
  • All-new control center with a digital multimeter, USB outlets, a front-facing fuel interface, and DuroMax’s exclusive MX2 switch that harnesses the generator's full power by combining the two 16-amp 120-volt circuits into one powerhouse 32-amp circuit. The digital multimeter displays voltage, frequency, total hours run, and hours until the recommended maintenance.
  • This generator runs on gasoline or propane, giving you the freedom and flexibility of fuel choice.
  • Equipped with DuroMax “CO Alert Technology” that will automatically shut down the generator if an unsafe level of carbon monoxide is detected.
  • Built using a powerful 210cc OHV DuroMax engine and features ALL COPPER WINDINGS designed to make your generator last for years.
  • The fully loaded power panel includes two 120V GFCI household outlets, one 120/240V 30AMP twist-lock outlet.
  • Onboard the XP4850HX are individual circuit breakers, an oversized noise reducing muffler with a built-in spark arrestor, and a low oil sensor.
 

Only as Strong as Its Core.
The DuroMax XP4850HX Generator has a Cast-Ironed Sleeved, 210cc Engine rated at 7 HP delivering a peak of 4850 surge watts / 3850 Constant. This is a sufficient amount of power that can handle high requirement loads as well as multiple small load appliances simultaneously. Designed for Safe and Easy Operation, the XP4850HX features a user-friendly, Electric Start, that's as simple as starting your car. It is also equipped with a recoil start in case of the battery being drained. Solid-Fill tires are also standard, they will never run flat, and high leverage handles that make it easy to transport over every terrain. (except water - we are working on skus). The attached oversized noise reducing Muffler has a built-in Spark Arrestor for safe use in mandated camping areas and jobsites. All DuroMax Generators are user-friendly and are ready to use out of the box within minutes. Simply remove all packaging, assemble the wheels and handles, add Oil and Gas and it is ready to begin producing power.

entry.summary:

Be ready for anything with the DuroMax XP8500EH generator. Equipped to run on either gasoline or liquid propane, this dual fuel unit can perform anywhere that portable power is needed. Easy to transport over any terrain, the XP8500EH generator will keep you going.

Key Features

  • Power Boost Technology

Features

  • Powerful Engine – The DuroMax 420cc OHV engine is a workhorse that provides plenty of power to handle multiple jobs, from powering high voltage appliances to heavy duty power tools.
  • Idle Control – Lowers the RPMs of the generator when not in use, saving fuel and reducing noise. Ideal on job sites where power is used intermittently.
  • MX2 Technology - Get the maximum power from each of the 120-volt receptacles. Choose between operating the generator at both 120V and 240V simultaneously, or at 120V only with full power. Ideal for usage with RVs.
  • Low Oil Shutoff – Protects your investment by automatically shutting the generator off when it senses that the oil is low.
  • Fully Featured Power Panel – The power panel includes a selection of outlets for maximum compatibility in your applications including: 4 120V household GFCI outlets and 1 120/240V twist lock outlet. The panel also includes a voltmeter, 12V automotive outlet, and 2 USB outlets.
